translations: 感情脆弱的；容易流泪的；酒后伤感的
（Maudlin）人名；（英）莫德琳（教名 Magdalen 的昵称）

sentences.sentence: Jimmy turned maudlin after three drinks.
sentences.translation: 三杯酒下肚后，吉米伤感起来。

sentences.sentence: He gets very maudlin when he's in his cups.
I can hear all of the maudlin talk already.
sentences.translation: 我现在已经能感受到所有伤感的话语。
